movies.title: Braveheart
movies.plot: Enraged at the slaughter of Murron, his new bride and childhood love, Scottish warrior William Wallace slays a platoon of the local English lord's soldiers. This leads the village to revolt and, eventually, the entire country to rise up against English rule.

events.title: William Wallace fights at the Battle of Falkirk
Robert the Bruce invokes the name of William Wallace at the Battle of Bannockburn
